channel.title: Os-Adventures
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Introduction Of the Server[/size]
Basically we currently cannot come up with a name so this is why the project is just set to #474 default.
So seeing how every server in the current runescape private server community is currently looking the same thing over and over with no different changes and no kind of uniqueness, made my partner (Flamable) & I to start our own runescape private server and basically show them how its really done :).
We are currently not like the other servers we have all the tools we basically need thanks to Flamable so there are no kind of limitations that we need to stop at and no need to hard-code anything into the client like these other people so any demands that players want in time can be reviewed and maybe added in the future.
I cannot give much information currently about what kind of exp rate it will be or what type of server it will be but i will say that we working as hard as we can to get good everything as perfect as we can to how runescape is.
I know this thread is pretty lame at the moment I will fix it in time i'm not the greatest :(
[u]Current Developers[/u]
Wizard Jesse Flamable
[img]http://puu.sh/dNZz5/2140b9daf9.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/dQxwn/5596fcff63.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/dQxEv/da1d1bc605.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/e6zHx/3c092c63c6.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/eiSAr/0806041929.jpg[/img]

item.title: Os-Adventures
item.dc:creator: @Tea1 Tea_
item.description:
@Tea1 wrote:

I think you should make it like OSRS with better experience rates, then add unique content… People, like myself, enjoy the OSRS a little bit easier type (like Arios). Then people that like RSPS, you can have more unique content for them.

-Tea

Read full topic

I hate giving an RSPS a name like ^
Is that supposed to sound epic and cool?
[/quote]

Would you rather call it

‘Keldarim’?

Or would you prefer

‘Dragon-Scape’

Gtfo mate, those are the best names.[/quote]
474 Project should be good enough
